jobDescription: Developing, documenting, releasing, and maintaining large-scale backend applications; working on bug fixing and improving microservices performance and scale; discovering, evaluating, and implementing new technologies to maximize development efficiency; optimizing performance for the microservice and keeping it up to date with the latest industry standards.
preferredQualifications: Experience in the usage of instruments to detect memory leaks and for performance optimization
In-depth understanding of industry recommended guidelines and best practices for coding
Knowledge of networking, various design patterns, and Multithreading
